content: [TextBlock(text="[2025 | Age 22] Just landed back in the bustling streets of NYC, but Tokyo's serene beauty lingers in my mind. The contrast is stark, yet the blend of tradition and tech in Japan has reshaped how I see this city. Feels like I'm seeing NYC through a new lens, one where 5G connectivity and autonomous EVs are just the beginning. Time to integrate what I've learned and make my mark here. #NYC #TechTravels", type='text')]
